itunes:title: dealing with hardship, loss, & grief while learning to love yourself through the process with Haley Polk
title: dealing with hardship, loss, & grief while learning to love yourself through the process with Haley Polk
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
Tough people last longer than tough times & today's guest is proof that you are stronger than your greatest challenges. Listen in, as Britt & Haley get deep about loss, grief, loneliness, body image, healthy & unhealthy motives, showing up for yourself & so much more.

*today's episode contains conversation about loss, disordered eating & other difficult subjects*
